January 9, 2021
Cyke82
Scult reuse aside, this Polaris is fine but rather uninspiring. Her trait is going to catch some people by surprise and perhaps disrupt some plans. She’s more offensive-oriented than her 50pt OP kit counterpart, and also has better keywords. It’s hard not to feel like she was an afterthought in this set, though.
